column4: There is a game that creates logs of multiplayer online games, but the IP addresses are in IPv6, although system is in IPv4 , how do I make it so that the game logs IPv4 addresses?
if players connect via IPv6, you can't.
you'd have to force the service (i.e. the game) to listen on IPv4 only.
thank you, btw the game is Warzone2100
